54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''Get the latest Updates from Compex Systems - [http://eepurl.com/bXB9j5 Link]'' "C-419EPW 7A01" is silkscreened on the module board. ===Product Key Features=== * Chipset: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 (DK04: Dakota/Wasabi) * 2×2 On-board 2.4GHz radio (400Mbps physical data rate) * 2×2 On-board 5GHz radio (867Mbps physical data rate) * 2x U.FL connectors, diplexer allows dual band concurrent * 2x GbE ports out, Dual Band (2.4/5GHz), 802.11ac Wave 2 * Supports Mini PCIe slot, Wi-Fi/LTE module, USB 3.0 port * Supports MU-MIMO, 802.11n WLAN applications (2.4/5GHz) * Supports 20/40MHz at 2.4GHz and 20/40/80MHz at 5GHz * Frequency Range: 2.412~2.472 GHz, 5.180~5.825 GHz ===Purchase Sample=== [http://shop.compex.com.sg/ Compex System Sample Store] ====Ordering Configuration==== 
Item Code		    Chipset	            Card Information
WSB419 7A01	    IPQ4019 2x2 2.4/5GHz            System on Module
